text:
h all woman in labour:
o avoid unnecessary episiotomies
o avoid unnecessary assisted deliveries
o avoid unnecessary rupture of membranes, but when ROM is indicated to induce or augment labour, it
can be done
o avoiding excessive suctioning of the infant
• Encourage skin to skin contact with the baby within one hour after delivery and initiate exclusive breastfeeding.
Caesarean delivery 
• CD
 in WLHIV is performed for the same obstetric indications and techniques as in HIV negative women.
